page.title: 04INDUSTRY SOUTH OF MANSFIELD.
page.content: The factories in our area are concentrated in the Hermitage Lane Industrial Estate apart from James Maude (Ironfounders), Boneham and Turners (precisron Engineers) and Mansfield Standard Sand. The number of employees range from 10 to 200. Most factories from 150 to 36000 square feet in area. They range in age from 3yrs to 60 yrs old. Hermitage Engineers make nuclear defence weapons.Status Engineering make electronic monitoring equipment. Mansfield Standard Sand make moulding sand and building sand, bricks.Boneham and Turners make dowlings.Hermitage Engineering have a number of jobs like fitters, welders and grinders.
